Description:
Live the Country and Coast Lifestyle
The Feel:
Set on 2.5 acres (approx) this stunning residence has an vast array of features from the luxe kitchen, formal living rooms and incredible gardens. This home will appeal to many. Situated to enjoy the best of beach and bush, Ocean Groves surf and amenities are minutes away, and the local primary school is just around the corner. Ideal for families seeking the enormous benefits of life on acreage, this extensive property provides so much.
The Facts:
-Contemporary 3BR plus study home on 2.5 (approx). picturesque acres
-Tree lined driveway leads to home, set back from the road, with 100% privacy
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Rhinds Rd, Wallington
-Living zones maximise the sunny North & West aspects, with a private, protected entertaining area
-Large kitchen positioned in the heart of the home, under high ceilings w/ stone island benchtop
-Smeg oven, Electrolux induction cooktop, Asko dishwasher & large Walk in Pantry
-2nd living offers formal lounge & dining room with garden views, large hearth & open fire place
-Bedrooms have fully fitted BIRs & enjoy garden views
-Master bedroom with ensuite with large shower & toilet
-Separate bedroom wing with bathroom, separate toilet & spa bath
-Stunning european Oak parquetry flooring
-Seasonal comfort with open fireplace, SSAC as well as ceiling fans
-Mature Orchard (40 trees) producing a range of fruit incl Apple, Pear, Nectarine, Peach and Cherry etc
-Mature Citrus incl Lime & Lemon
-DLUG with solid concrete flooring & internal door access to large workshop, ensuite, kitchen and 2 more separate store rooms
-13,500L Rainwater tank for garden & drinking, plus town water supply
-Only 5mins to Gateway Plaza SC, less than 10mins to Ocean Grove shops, cafes & beach
The Owner Loves.
I love the family/kitchen room, with the garden views through every window, it is such a very peaceful and comfortable home to be inside

Description:
Immaculately Presented Home in Central Walk Estate
The Feel:
Situated in sought-after Central Walk, this 3-bedroom home presents as new. Immaculately presented, the floorplan provides open plan living & a protected outdoor lifestyle zone, capitalising on the sunny north orientation with a private outdoor therapeutic spa. Ziptrack café blinds to the undercover deck promise year-round entertaining, while a luxurious master wing & 2 versatile bedrooms/study will suit first home buyers or downsizers. High quality appliances, stone benches & a WIP make cooking a breeze. Parks & wetlands provide a lovely setting, conveniently located under 1km from the local school & shops.
The Facts:
-Quality custom-built brick veneer & linear board residence, built by Simonds Homes
-Highly regarded Central Walk estate boasts stunning parklands
-Inviting pathway to private entry with oak timber laminate floors throughout & carpet to bedrooms
-Open plan living, meals & kitchen features glass pendant lights
-Modern kitchen with clean lines, caesarstone island bench, picture window & WIP
-Stainless steel appliances (Technika 900mm oven & gas hob, DeLonghi DW)
-Sunny living & meals area connects seamlessly to outdoor area via stacker sliding doors
-Undercover alfresco area with merbau deck & Ziptrack café blinds for year-round entertaining
-Leisurescape Sorrento 3 hydro therapy spa with 51 jets & side by side reclining lounges
-Ducted heating/evaporative cooling throughout, & ceiling fans in all rooms
-Spacious Master wing with Queen size bedroom, TV point & WIR
-Luxury en-suite with large shower, vanity, Lucci 3in1 bathroom heater & WC
-2 more bedrooms with BIRs & flexibility to set up a home office
-Central bathroom (vanity, XL tub, shower, Lucci 3in1 bathroom heater, sep WC)
-5.5kw solar panel system, continuous flow gas hot water system
-Fully fenced low maintenance landscaped garden with synthetic turf at rear
-Exposed aggregate driveway to RC SLUG with internal & rear path access
-3mins drive to cafes & shops, 1km to Drysdale PS, 600m to Rail Trail
The Owner Loves.
I love the convenience of this location and that I always feel like Im on a holiday... Theres nothing better than relaxing in the spa every night, with the therapeutic benefits of hydro therapy jets.

Description:
Owner Says Sell! If you have the site, this is perfect!
The owner of this immaculate 4-year-old relocatable cabin has given me clear instruction to SELL!
The asking price is well below replacement cost.
The cabin must be relocated from its current site to your preferred location.
This is an opportunity not to be missed if you are looking for a "lock up and leave" option, granny flat in your backyard (STCA) even a holiday house on a bush block the options are endless!!
The cabin has been tastefully completed with superior fittings throughout, beautiful timber flooring, loads of storage, ceiling fans in both BRS, stylish plantation shutters, reverse cycle A/C in the living space complete with sliding doors opening onto a private undercover deck.
The owner is very motivated and will consider all reasonable offers.

Description:
Family Living At Its Finest
The Feel:
Boasting bay views & close proximity to Drysdale village, this custom-built family home (HIA Awards finalist) is located in a prestigious locale. This substantial property comprises 4 sizable bedrooms, including a grand master with private balcony & Bay views, his 'n' hers WIRs & a spa en-suite with twin vanities & double shower. Four living areas include a home theatre room, entertainers kitchen & the convenience of a home office at the entry. Space & style is yours on Sundial Drive.
The Facts:
-Custom 2-storey urban lifestyle property w/ zoned floorplan for entertaining & family life
-Elevated Master captures panoramic views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Spacious, light-filled living areas & outstanding design features
-Seamless connection to private entertaining area with merbau decking
-High ceilings, wide tiled entry & Southern Box floating floors extend the sense of spaciousness
-Superb fixtures, custom window furnishings & quality carpet flooring throughout
-Ducted Inverter heating & cooling ensures total comfort
-Front entry with adjacent private home office
-Cinema with raised seating platform, 4K Ultra HD Projector, 100 fixed screen & surround sound
-Cinema lounges are included in sale
-Family lounge with 50 tv & direct access to protected alfresco entertaining
-OP kitchen/dining/living at the rear with cosy gas log fire
-Chefs kitchen w/ superior European appliances & enormous WI butler's pantry w/ additional sink.
-Smeg 900mm gas/electric cooker & range hood, Bosch dishwasher & glass splashback
-Fully equipped laundry with laundry chute & walk-in storeroom
-Powder room convenient to the living zones
-Understair storeroom & ample storage throughout
-5-star master suite with 42 tv, bay-view balcony, His n Hers WIRs & luxurious en-suite
-En-suite with bay-view spa bath, twin vanities, double shower & separate WC
-Remote control ceiling fans in all bedrooms
-Generous upper living zone with built-in storage & 42 tv
-Dedicated "kids' level" with living room, big bathroom which includes bath, shower, laundry chute & separate WC & 2 BRs with BIRs & study areas
-RC DLUG with exposed agg concrete driveway & internal access
-Additional highlights inc: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, 5.5kW solar & ducted vacuum
-Set within a short walk of all family amenities, shopping and a choice of schools
-In the heart of The Bellarine, well-known for wineries, beaches & watersports
The Owner Loves.
Raising a family in a home that is so accessible & well planned has been a joy. We love the open plan kitchen & living area that brings everyone together, with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy quiet time & study. Our days often conclude with a glass of wine overlooking the Bay & You Yangs on our private balcony.

Description:
Best Of Both Worlds - Tender Now Closed.
Occupying an expansive 2+ acres (9,967 sqm), this elevated site offers the best of rural living only moments from the Drysdale town centre. Undulating with established foliage at times this location feels like a world away from the city grind. It is offered with a home that may present an opportunity for a builder or a do it yourself renovator who has the skill and knowledge to salvage the home and bringing it back to life, or simply start again with a blank canvas and build your dream home. Just a few moments to Lake Lorne and parkland, a safe ride to the Pony Club, or along the Rail Trail plus St Thomas Catholic Primary School, Saint Ignatius College Geelong and literally a 6 minute drive to the town centre and around 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD. On the beautiful Bellarine this is the change you have been looking for.
**Now known as 1-29 McKiernan Street, Drysdale.
Tender Now Closed.
Tender closing 10th September 2020 at 4:00 PM.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Address: 118 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
LOOKS CAN BE DECEIVING
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, Inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Contact agent to organise a time.
Looks can be deceiving, there is more behind the door of this home than what you would expect when you do a drive by. Not only one living area but two, not only three bedrooms but the option of a fourth or study.
The back yard is also larger than you would imagine too. Rarely do the kid's balls go over the fence. If they do itâs a very big kick! Vegie patches exist to feed the ever growing family. Enjoy the Undercover entertainment area with a view of the pretty garden and lush green grass.
The current owners have enjoyed being close to all the open spaces and parks for the kids to run. They have enjoyed being close to the water all year round. They are likely to remain in the area as it offers all they require plus more.
There is a choice of schools, medical centres, sporting clubs, dance groups, but wait there's more: Restaurants, cafes, bike trails etc. One of the many highlights of living here is the Bellarine Tourist Railway. Runs from Queenscliff to Drysdale on weekends and during the week in the school holidays.
What is your wish list for a home? Are you looking to downsize, buy your first home or invest? This home would be the perfect solution for any of the above options.
Tucked behind a high fence on a 609m2 (approx) it is a very quiet place to escape to.
Would you like to see whatâs behind the fence? Well call me to book a time to check it out.

Description:
Brand New With Bay Views
This brand new four bedroom townhouse is ideal for a busy family who enjoys entertaining. The clever floor plan takes advantage of the wonderful northerly aspect and the spacious upstairs living has fabulous views of Corio Bay and the You Yangs. Other features include undercover balcony fully equipped modern kitchen with walk in pantry, study nook, main bedroom with views, walk in robe, ensuite, a second living area with deck and an additional three bedrooms downstairs, central heating and cooling, double garage with auto door and internal access, wide drive for boat or trailer plus a landscaped garden. Ready to move in and enjoy.

Description:
Functional Family Living with Side Access
With plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy, this sensational home is ready and waiting for you to make your own. The perfect starter for first home buyers, young families, downsizers still wanting space to tinker or a savvy investment, this will tick all boxes.
Taking advantage of the natural light throughout, the free-flowing floorplan offers flexible family living. The heart of the home offers itself in the way of an open plan kitchen, equipped with SS appliances, breakfast bench and an abundance of storage, which overlooks the dining and open family area.
The master suite sits at the fore, with WIR and fully equipped ensuite, with the remaining 2 spacious bedrooms offering BIR positioned from the central hallway. A 2nd separate living area, family bathroom, laundry and toilet complete this practical abode, which is also equipped with ducted heating and split system cooling.
With sliding double door access from the hub of the heart, effortless outdoor entertaining is on offer all year round. The impressive undercover alfresco overlooks the open grassed space, with a concreted open area also providing a wealth of outdoor living.
What sets this property apart from the rest is the space for all the toys! Set upon a 535m2 parcel, multiple cars, caravans, trailers and everything in between can be safely secured in the DLUG or the gated side access, which offers through access to the back garden.
All major amenities, schools, public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail at your fingertips, with the best of the Bellarine and the Geelong CBD only 10 minutes away, It's easy to see why Leopold is becoming increasingly popular, with no signs of slowing down!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Coast Meets The Sea
The Feel:
Situated on just under 2 acres of private land in prestigious Wallington, this solid brick home offers family living with all the fun of sunny entertaining areas, & a solar-heated, salt-chlorinated pool. Combining privacy, lifestyle, location & entertainment, the living spaces face north, with 4 bedrooms & a study satisfying the needs of a large family. Enjoy pool parties, ride horses out the back, & embrace rural living... all just minutes by car to Ocean Grove shops & beaches & 20 mins to Geelong.
The Facts:
-Classic 4BR+study solid brick home on just under 2 picturesque acres
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in Wallington, w/ low maintenance landscaped gardens & large paddock at the rear
-Salt-chlorinated, solar heated 10x5m (approx.), 60,000L pool with paved surrounds
-Powered/plumbed pool house with 6 seater spa, bar fridge, outdoor sound system, lighting, bar & decks
-Living & entertaining zone faces north, sliding doors maximise sunny aspects & relaxed way of life
-Classic blackwood country kitchen w/ slate tiles & leadlight windows is central heart of the home
-Miele electric wall oven, induction cooktop, rangehood & Bosch dishwasher
-Views from the kitchen to the pool and the horses & south garden with a bottle tree, camellias & hibiscus trees
-Open plan meals & living area with Coonara, overlooking the alfresco area & pool
-2nd living room is a sunny space overlooking the pool, zoned off with double sliding doors
-North-facing Master BR with deck, garden views, BIRs, en-suite (shower/vanity/toilet/ IXL Tastic)
-3 more bedrooms off the hall, all with mirrored BIRs & garden outlooks
-Family bathroom with bath, shower, blackwood vanity, slate tiles, skylight, IXL Tastic, leadlight windows & separate toilet
-Brand new hot water service, split system heating and AC, new carpet in all BRs & 2nd living
-Adjoining laundry room with linen storage
-SLUG with circular driveway & OSP for 3-4 cars
-8.7 x 3m workshop/tool shed
-Study with separate entry that can be used for a home office: with direct access to the road via side paddock
-Septic with Aquacycle system for irrigation of paddocks
-Large 1.5 acre (approx.) paddock with bluegum lined side access, great shade, water trough, dam
-Space & facilities to have horses, with double horse shelter, horse yard & mains powered electric fencing
-Secure fenced area around house for kids & pets, w/ Hills Hoist & a garden shed
-Freshly mulched gardens feature lemons, palms, agaves, natives, roses & daisies en masse
-Versatile shedding for chooks, horse feed storage & gated area that could be utilised as a dog run
-Seasonal comfort with 7kw SSAC & Coonara wood heater in main living/dining, as well as ceiling fan in master bedroom and outdoor alfresco area
-School bus stop at the front gate
-The Paddock Café is only 500m away for coffee
-20mins to Geelong, 6mins to cafes & beaches in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves.
There is so much to love about this home... From swimming in the pool on hot summer nights, to riding horses out through the back gate; its great to be so close to the beach, schools and work, yet living the rural lifestyle with our horses and the amazing bird life including the flying bricks, wedge tail eagles, kookaburras and rainbow lorikeets.

Description:
Short Stroll To The Waterfront
The Clifton Springs and Curlewis north facing waterfronts are both just a short stroll along the Griggs Creek walking track from this rejuvenated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom BV home. Freshly painted and with new carpets, the home enjoys a formal lounge and master bedroom at the front with an open and light filled north facing lounge and 2 further bedrooms at the rear. The outdoor entertaining flows on from the open plan living, whilst the back yard of the 685 sqm block is accessed via double gates perfect for the boat or caravan. The fantastic list of extras in this home include gas central heating, reverse cycle split system air conditioning, ample off street parking, double glazing in front windows and a Clifton Springs Primary school catchment position.

Description:
Truly Comfortable Living in Leopolds Finest Estate
'They don't build them like they used to' rings true with this thoughtfully built and custom designed home.
Unlike the typical 'volume' builds common throughout newer Estates, no stone has been left unturned with the generous living accommodation and quality fitout that is on offer which truly can only be appreciated with an inspection.
For the recreationally minded, the Bellerine Rail Trail entry is directly over the road, whilst the Leopold Memorial Reserve and Canowindra Reserve are close-by. There's easy access to The Gateway Plaza for all your shopping and dining needs, with the Leopold Community Hub, library and confirming how resourceful your new lifestyle could be!
3 double bedrooms all with ceiling fan and extended BIRs
Master features dual entry walk-thru-robe plus ensuite with separate WC
Expansive, light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining with sheer & block-out blinds
Ample kitchen bench space plus additional cupboard storage with oversized pantry
2nd separate living area ideal for guests/separate tv-viewing
Zoned gas-ducted heating throughout plus evaporative cooling
Fully-upgraded alfresco with four-season blinds, bluestone pavers, spotted gum decking, electric awning & ceiling fan plus outdoor powerpoints and gas connection for genuine BBQ cooking
Approx gross yield of 4.7% for the savvy investor
For full inclusions list please contact agent
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
SOLD BEFORE ADVERTISING
Showcasing beautifully-presented interiors, superb entertaining options, and a north-facing backyard, this home takes fine family living to a whole new level!
Nestled in a peaceful pocket of the Bellrise Park Estate, this family-friendly neighbourhood will leave you wanting nothing. The local playground and sporting grounds are only a short stroll from the front door, meaning you wont have to venture far for some outdoor fun. Public transport is also within walking distance, while families will appreciate easy access to Leopold P.S. and the Leopold Community Hub. Enjoy living moments from the Gateway Plaza, Gateway Sanctuary and Lake Connewarre.
High ceilings grace the interiors, while the wide entrance creates a lovely sense of openness from the moment you step inside. The spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone unites with the alfresco deck via glass stacker doors creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for entertaining! Whether you want to relax under the shade or soak up the sunshine, the north-facing deck creates a beautiful outdoor setting while flowing onto the secure backyard. The kitchen seamlessly blends style and functionality with stone waterfall benchtops, large walk-in pantry, and ILVE stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, microwave and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Pendant lights make a stylish statement above both the breakfast bar and dining area. The lounge creates a light-filled retreat at the rear of the home, while the study will delight students and home business owners alike.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom creates a calming oasis for busy parents. The dressing area and walk-in robe are wonderfully generous, while the en suite features a large shower, dual vanity and separate toilet. Three additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. Floor-to-ceiling tiling and stone benchtops grace both bathrooms, while the laundry is complete with external access. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you in the utmost comfort. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
Treat your family to the lifestyle youve been dreaming of in Leopold! Inspection will impress!

Description:
Family Appeal with Amazing Future Prospects!
Not every day does an opportunity like 20 Kimberley Avenue present itself where the location is everything and the astute buyer will enjoy the proximity and the convenience of being able to walk to the vibrant Drysdale Shopping Precinct.
This versatile property, totalling 658sqm (approx.), makes its return to the market for the first time in over 30 years. This home would be perfect for those looking to break into the first home buyer market or those looking to renovate and invest. With its blank palette and the right amount of imagination this home could be transformed into something special.
Featuring a classic floor-plan design with 3 bedrooms, 2 spacious living areas and a practical kitchen, this home will not disappoint. A side access driveway has enough space to accommodate a boat and a caravan. The backyard features established citrus trees and other various fruit trees and plenty of water storage options (3 x 8000 litre water tanks).
To further enhance this irresistible opportunity, a short stroll sees you in the heart of Central Drysdale's vibrancy where you will find cafes, restaurants, shopping options and a vast array of high-quality schools close by. Award winning wineries and lifestyles pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for are only minutes' drive from this fabulous location. Opportunities like this do not come around very often, so please feel free to call me anytime to arrange an inspection at this property.

Description:
The Jewel Of Drysdale!
This beautifully appointed residence is sure to delight prospective buyers with an uncompromising buying brief. A custom build of the highest calibre is complemented by an enviable location; the wonderful village lifestyle of the Drysdale township is literally a stones throw from your doorstep. Light filled living zones, impressive high ceilings and myriad of custom features provide just a hint to what is sure to be a memorable inspection.
2 bedrooms of grand proportions; both complete with built-in robes and wonderful outlook to delightful garden settings
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/dining/lounge. Expansive windows and a northerly aspect promote an abundance of natural light. A glass sliding door creates as seamless connection to a sheltered courtyard; a tranquil spot to take in a morning coffee 'or' an evening glass of one of your favourite local award winning wineries.
The kitchen serves up a great user friendly space; expansive benchtops, updated Westinghouse and Bosch appliances and excellent storage solutions.
A modernised bathroom is spacious; complete with bath, shower and a skylight yet again ensures a light and bright experience.
All the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
The garage has remote controlled access and rear pedestrian access; the gable roof creates further storage solutions.
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wineries, a vibrant café and restaurant scene, fully equipped medical services, beautiful parklands and the tranquillity of the 'sea change' are all at 'arms reach' if you are lucky enough to secure the charming 2/15 Carolanne Drive, Drysdale

Description:
An ideal first home, investment or downsizer - Neat as a pin!
** PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR A PRIVATE INSPECTION **
What a fantastic opportunity to get into the housing market. This 3bedroom brick veneer home positioned on 328sqms* with separate title, 12 solar panels, remote garage is the perfect start for any first home buyer, the astute investor or as an ideal home to the downsize too. Located in a quiet & established court with public transport, local schools & Leopold Plaza just minutes away. The Floorplan highlights a spacious & light filled open plan lounge, dining & kitchen area with sliding door access to the outdoor alfresco entertaining & private rear yard. The Master bedroom includes a WIR & En-suite with heated towel rails & digital controlled hot water system. Further-more, the additional bedrooms are complete with BIRs & serviced by the central bathroom & separate toilet.
The home is temperature controlled by a large split system A/C unit in the lounge with an additional gas space heater located in the open plan dining & kitchen creating all year- round comfort.
A superbly presented home with low maintenance gardens all in within close proximity to Geelongs CBD, Bellarine Peninsula & Ocean Grove.
We look forward to welcoming you home.

Address: 19-23 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
STUNNING BAY VIEWS , PRIVATE LUSH GARDENS AND SUSTAINABLE LIVING!
The earth will provide, this amazing property comes with an orchard and raised garden beds for vegetables straight to the table. The garden is a haven and frames this large solid home with your very own rainforest, which has easy to maintain matured plants, ferns, a Bromeliad collection and so much colour from the various natives and flowers. The home enjoys a formal entrance with generous lounge room, formal dining and huge second open plan space with meals, well equipped kitchen and living overlooking the atrium into the rainforest. The dwelling has been strategically positioned to achieve sunlight from its northerly orientation whilst the panoramic bay views over the vast gardens are like framed pictures through the windows. The 4 bedroom home features a master with ensuite, spa and dressing room, three further bedrooms with BIR'S all have garden and bay views, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas hydronic floor heating, 2 solar hotwater units, 12 panel 3kw solar system, gas wall heater, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, Indian hand cut slate floor tiling, Tasmanian blackwood cabinetry & huge pantry. Outside has 16,000L of rainwater storage, electric pump plumbed to garden taps, storage, greenhouse and much more. Entertaining is easy with large verandas, undercover BBQ space, rotunda with views and gardens or just relax in your favourite spot with your cocktail or afternoon tea. A double garage & extra large workshop flow into a brilliant space suitable for a mancave, gym or storage space for the toys. With an abundance of nature, space and privacy this wonderful home nourishes the body & soul while living and enjoying the beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula's wine, food, beaches.....sheer bliss.

Description:
BEAUTY ON BAY SHORE
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Contact agent to organise a time.
As we do life circumstances change and decisions need to be made. My Vendor has thoroughly enjoyed living here but now it's time for a change.
The lounge and dining room are on the west side of the home to benefit from the afternoon sun and provide a bright and cosy atmosphere. This central living zone features a gas wall heater as well as a split system A/C. The big draw card of the property is that the master bedroom has a WIR and an ensuite bathroom which is very rarely seen in this price bracket.
Being the rear unit it is discreetly tucked away from the street so road noise will never be a problem. The car will be secure in the single lock up garage.
Clifton Springs is a suburb on the edge of Corio Bay so if you enjoy walking a stroll down to the water's edge will reveal the You Yangs and the large ships moving in and out for the Bay. Yachts really enjoy this bay too. Enquire today for your private inspection.

Description:
Perfect start or Savvy Investment!
Affordable entry level buying, this will make for the perfect first home, low maintenance investment or downsize. Featuring light-filled interiors, a north-facing alfresco deck, vehicle access to the spacious backyard, all upon a generous 525m2, this home ticks every box.
The open plan living zone creates the heart of the home, while flowing onto the sheltered alfresco deck for breezy indoor-outdoor living. Soaking up the northern sunshine, this outdoor zone provides the perfect setting for lazy weekends or entertaining family and friends. The kitchen will delight with a large built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom creates a calming oasis for parents. The walk-in robe provides ample storage, while the en suite features a shower, toilet, and single vanity. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry boasts ample storage and external access. You'll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans. The secure backyard wraps around the home - creating a wealth of space. The remote double lock-up garage features internal and external access, while gated side access to the backyard is ideal for storing caravans, boats, or trailers.
A carefree lifestyle is part of the package with everything you could possibly need within easy reach. Public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail are only footsteps from your front door, with the Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary School and all amenities only moments away. 10 minutes to both the Geelong CBD and the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula, it's easy to see why Leopold is becoming the place to be!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Relaxed & Convenient Living
This neatly maintained home offers comfortable living for the first home buyers, young families or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complimented by its superb location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Situated in the highly sought-after Kensignton Estate and set on approximately 509m2, this well-maintained family home has so much to offer. Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms, plus a study. The master bedroom offers a private ensuite and ample robe space, while remaining bedrooms utilize the spacious central bathroom and separate toilet. The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates the open plan kitchen, dining and living zone at the hub of the home. The functional kitchen includes dishwasher, large stainless-steel gas cooktop & oven, and an abundance of storage and bench space. Furthermore, the two separate living zones provide extra space for the whole family to relax and enjoy.
Completing this ideal property is the enormous, undercover outdoor entertaining area. As far as alfresco dining goes, this is certainly impressive, perfect for enjoying family BBQs. The rear yard also offers a lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all, as well as the low maintenance border garden being both pretty and practical.
Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, split system A/C and double garage.
Within close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport, parks, and playgrounds only a stones throw away. Not to mention only moments from some of the best attractions the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. This home simply caters to everyone! Sure to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new family residence. This property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!
